Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: ~ashcherbakov will GET_REV_REG_DELTA be implemented in this ticket scope?

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: ~sergey.minaev Yes, this is for both GET_REVOC_REG and GET_REVOC_REG_DELTA

Action.author: ashcherbakov
Action.body: We need to have regular updates (with latest timestamp) to reduce the risk for malicious nodes to send very old data for GET_REVOC_REG. So, we need to implement INDY-933.
